connector.description:
Send Batch message to an AWS SQS Queue.

Access Key/Secret Key are the basic method for authenticating to the AWS SQS Service. These parameters are optional, because the Kamelet provide also the 'useDefaultCredentialsProvider'.

When using a default Credentials Provider the SQS client will load the credentials through this provider and won't use the static credential. This is reason for not having the access key and secret key as mandatory parameter for this Kamelet.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.queueNa.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.queueNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.queueNa.description: The SQS Queue name or ARN

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.accessK.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.accessK.description: The access key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.secretK.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.secretK.description: The secret key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.region.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.region
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.region.description: The AWS region to connect to Example: eu-west-1

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.autoCre.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.autoCreateQueue
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.autoCre.description: Setting the autocreation of the SQS queue.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.amazonA.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.amazonAWSHost
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.amazonA.description: The hostname of the Amazon AWS cloud.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.protoco.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.protocol
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.protoco.description: The underlying protocol used to communicate with SQS Example: http or https

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.useDefa.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.useDefa.description: Set whether the SQS client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.uriEndp.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.uriEndp.description: Set the overriding endpoint URI. This option needs to be used in combination with overrideEndpoint option.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.overrid.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-batch-sink.overrid.description: Set the need for overiding the endpoint URI. This option needs to be used in combination with uriEndpointOverride setting.
